subject: Boston Marathon Bombings (2013)
Basketball
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The N.H.L. postponed Monday’s Ottawa Senators-Boston Bruins game in Boston in the aftermath of the Boston Marathon bombings. The Celtics game on Tuesday against the Pacers was canceled.
snippet: The N.H.L. postponed Monday’s Ottawa Senators-Boston Bruins game in Boston in the aftermath of the Boston Marathon bombings. The Celtics game on Tuesday against the Pacers was canceled.
